Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Heike Osswald
Reviews.Content: Its easy to operateLight to handleGood as beginner modelTakes good pictures from the beginning onHas all you need

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for beginner/Enthusiast
Reviews.Author: Sam Basu
Reviews.Content: Just used this camera on vacation and took tons of pictures - easy, hassle-free and great for a beginner like myself. Starting off with the preset options, it lets you grow. Very happy with purchase so far.
